availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Penfield A. N. Bradley (Louisville, Kentucky, printer)

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, printer. Tennessee native. Married to Heathey E. Potter Bradley in Louisville, Kentucky, on September 7, 1857. Father of Mary E. Bradley and Jola Bradley. Printer in Louisville, Kentucky in 1858. Printer in Louisville in 1860. Printer in Louisville in 1861.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville, Ward 4, p. 87.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll #994040, Jefferson County Marriages, p. 33.
Louisville City Directory and Business Mirror for 1858-1859 (Louisville: Hurd & Burrows, 1859), 32.
"Penfield A. N. Bradley (1831-1867)," Find A Grave, Memorial #84367972, accessed August 18, 2021, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/84367972.
